recipe.title: Cazzies Veggie Soup
recipe.ingredient: Any veggies you have in your fridge!
recipe.step: Heat oil in large pot and cook garlic and ginger for 5 minutes. Add spices and cook a further 2 minutes. Add lentils and stock and bring to the boil. Reduce to simmer and cook for 20 minutes. Meanwhile chop the vegetables you want to add ( great for any veggies you want to get rid of at the end of the week.) Cook for about 20 minutes or until veggies are cooked. Serve with a dollop of Greek yogurt and naan bread if desired.
